## Header 1

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(targets)
tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- tar_read(lipidomics)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
```

## Results: basic stats table

```{r}
tar_read(table_descriptive_stats) |>
  knitr::kable(
    caption = "The mean and standard deviation of metabolites in the lipidomics dataset."
  )
```

## Plot of distributions

```{r}
tar_read(plot_distributions)
```

## Preprocessing & model results

```{r}
cholest <- "Cholesterol"
create_model_results(lipidomics, metabol = cholest)
```

## Running multiple models

```{r}
just_cholesterol <- lipidomics |>
  filter(metabolite == "Cholesterol") |>
  Preprocess()

fit_all_models(just_cholesterol)

lipidomics |>
  filter(metabolite == cholest) |>
  Preprocess() |>
  fit_all_models()

```

## Fitiing all metabolites

```{r}
total_models(lipidomics, metabolite)
```
